p: The GC/MS method described in (A), optimized for analyzing trace impurities in PFCL, is highly sensitive and, therefore, enables the identification of considerably more impurities compared with earlier analyses 3 (see Table 2). These impurities are highlighted in Figure 2. We also detected the impurities Pastor et al. 3 identified but only in batches 171214 and 061014 (not shown).
